author: cms-L1TK
body: In L1Trigger/TrackFindingTracklet/interface/Track.h, the equation used to calculate eta is incorrect. This was noticed when printing out eta values from tracks in PurgeDuplicate.cc and comparing them to the eta printed out from the debug statements in L1TrackNtupleMaker.cc. Once the fix was made, the two values agreed.
title: Changing equation for eta in Track.h
